plot: Growing up on a small island her whole life with little to do, a young girl yearns for escape, while having to cope with her best friend's inevitable departure.
title: Isla de Los Ladrones
plot_es: Growing up on a small island her whole life with little to do, a young girl yearns for escape, while having to cope with her best friend's inevitable departure.
plot_en: Growing up on a small island her whole life with little to do, a young girl yearns for escape, while having to cope with her best friend's inevitable departure.
